page.title: 01INTRODUCTION TO BALMULLO
page.content:
Welcome to Balmullo! The pupils of P.4 and P.5 have great pleasure in introducing you to our village and its surrounding agricultural land.
Balmullo, which is in North East Fife, is the only village in the area we have studied. The name "Balmullo" probably means "the town under the headland". The nearest towns are Cupar and St Andrews, both about 6 miles away, while about 7 miles to the north, across the River Tay is the city of Dundee.
We have gathered the information for the project in several ways. We have been out and about to look at the area, interviewed local inhabitants and issued questionnaires. We would like to thank all the people who helped us.
